com.flowpowered.caustic.api

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.Material
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Material>

    public class Material
extends Object
implements Comparable<Material>
    Represents an OpenGL material. Materials are assigned to models, and these can share the same material. The material provides the shader program to use when rendering the models, the texture for each unit (if any) and a set of uniforms that will be constant for all models using the material.

      Returns true if a texture is present in the unit.

      • addTexture

        public void addTexture(int unit,
                       Texture texture)
        Adds a texture to the material. If a texture is a already present in the same unit as this one, it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        unit - The unit to add the texture to
        texture - The texture to add
